author: Douglas Belkin
title: Illinois Gov. Bruce Rauner to Face Democrat J.B. Pritzker in General Election
text:
Illinois Gov. Bruce Rauner survived a surprisingly tight race Tuesday night over a conservative state representative in the Republican gubernatorial primary and will face Democrat J.B. Pritzker in the general election in November.
A contest between two of the wealthiest men in the Midwest is the most likely gubernatorial pickup opportunity for Democrats this year. It also has the potential to become the most expensive nonpresidential election in the nationâ€™s history.
...
